title: Max Baucus: Filibusters, China and a more partisan Senate
description: Former Sen. Max Baucus (D-Mont.) and former ambassador to China talks to Chuck about why he believes the filibuster should be preserved ... but could be reformed.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
